data.name: A Game of Thrones
data.description: Here is the first volume in George R. R. Martin’s magnificent cycle of novels that includes A Clash of Kings and A Storm of Swords.

data.name: A Thousand Splendid Suns
data.description: A Thousand Splendid Suns is a breathtaking story set against the volatile events of Afghanistan's last thirty years—from the Soviet invasion to the reign of the Taliban to post-Taliban rebuilding—that puts the violence, fear, hope, and faith of this country in intimate, human terms.

data.name: Charlotte's Web
data.description: This beloved book by E. B. White, author of Stuart Little and The Trumpet of the Swan, is a classic of children's literature

data.name: Fifty Shades of Grey
data.description: When literature student Anastasia Steele goes to interview young entrepreneur Christian Grey, she encounters a man who is beautiful, brilliant, and intimidating.

data.name: Gone with the Wind
data.description: Gone with the Wind is a novel written by Margaret Mitchell, first published in 1936.

data.name: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
data.description: Tyrannical Nurse Ratched rules her ward in an Oregon State mental hospital with a strict and unbending routine, unopposed by her patients, who remain cowed by mind-numbing medication and the threat of electric shock therapy.

data.name: The Alchemist
data.description: Paulo Coelho's masterpiece tells the mystical story of Santiago, an Andalusian shepherd boy who yearns to travel in search of a worldly treasure

data.name: The Book Thief
data.description: Nazi Germany. The country is holding its breath. Death has never been busier, and will be busier still.By her brother's graveside, Liesel's life is changed when she picks up a single object, partially hidden in the snow.

data.name: The Chronicles of Narnia
data.description: Journeys to the end of the world, fantastic creatures, and epic battles between good and evil—what more could any reader ask for in one book?...

data.name: The Da Vinci Code
data.description: An ingenious code hidden in the works of Leonardo da Vinci.A desperate race through the cathedrals and castles of Europe
